title: Teen shot, killed on east side
content:
INDIANAPOLIS (WTHR) - A teenager was shot and killed on the east side Saturday night. Police identified the victim Sunday morning as 16-year-old Theothus Carter of Indianapolis.
Detectives believe Carter was a passenger in a vehicle at the Conoco gas station when he was shot by an unknown suspect. The victim was later found by responding officers just outside the passenger side of the vehicle.
Investigators detained several people for questioning, but no one has been arrested.
Detectives have not yet made public any suspect or suspect vehicle information but still encourage anyone with information about this incident to call the IMPD Homicide Office at 317.327.3475 or Crime Stoppers of Central Indiana at 317.262.8477 or TIPS.
